dataModel.title: Vegetation Plots Database Component Description: commCorrelation
dataModel.author: J. Harris

entity.entitySummary: This table correlates multiple community concepts as they change through time.

attribute.attDefinition: Database assigned value to each unique record in the communityCorrelation table.
This is the foreign key into the CommConcept table "pointing" to the earlier concept which correlates with a concept that used more recently.
This is the foreign key into the communityConcept table "pointing" to the more recent concept that correlates with an older concept usage.
This is the descriptive attribute that is used to relate the congruence between two concepts.
This is the start date for an occurence of a correlation between two concepts.
This is the stop date for an occurence of a correlation between two concepts.
